channel.title: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)
channel.description:
[poll type=regular public=true] * I love old scorned picture * I am okay with old scorned picture, and hate current one * I am okay with old scorned picture, and am also okay with current one [/poll]
Old scorned picture was amazing, bring it back

item.title: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
I suddenly thought that you are one of the banned player .-.

Read full topic
item.source: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)

item.title: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)
item.dc:creator: Weizen1988
item.description:
I don’t want the artists to feel bad. Maybe could have a player art day/contest (come up with a better name) where the portraits are boslof ones and other submissions, and go back to the real portraits the next day? The artists work is respected and not wasted, player artists get to do fan art, and people get a good laugh looking at submissions to vote for winners?

Read full topic
item.source: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)

item.description:

item.title: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
ThePlex:

The old one was a crude drawing done with paint by Boslof.

it was hilarious and well drawn

ThePlex:

The new one was done by a professional artist who has done a lot of the other art.

well then can we use the old one for something else, or new one for something else?

ThePlex:

Also, Xblade is busy with the game, why should he moderator the forums when we can?

he saw the post, so he IS moderating it. It would have taken longer to ask you to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: Petition for old scorned picture (Joke thread)

and why didn’t xblade just change it?

The old one was a crude drawing done with paint by Boslof.

The new one was done by a professional artist who has done a lot of the other art.

Also, Xblade is busy with the game, why should he moderator the forums when we can?
